title: WHERE IS BENJAMIN CHAVIS TODAY.  THE ARTICLE DID NOT SAY.
text:
Chavis isn't a Wilmington man. MyReporter uses its resources to
report on life in Southeastern North Carolina, which we define as
Brunswick, New Hanover and Pender counties.

That said, Wikipedia has this to say:

Today Dr. Chavis is no longer connected with the Nation of Islam. He
works with Inter-Faith efforts as well as ecumenical movements to
establish better levels of understanding among Christians, Jews, and
Muslims.
